properties.Title: Severe Thunderstorm Watch In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: Conditions are favourable for the development of severe thunderstorms that may be capable of producing strong wind gusts, large hail and heavy rain. ### Remember, severe thunderstorms can produce tornadoes. Severe thunderstorm watches are issued when atmospheric conditions are favourable for the development of thunderstorms that could produce one or more of the following: large hail, damaging winds, torrential rainfall. Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to QCstorm@canada.ca or tweet reports using #QCStorm.
Expires: 2019-08-22T13:34:44-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2019-08-22T04:34:44-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.3958293310.2019
Area: Saint-Michel-des-Saints area, Saint-Donat - Mont-Tremblant Park area, Matawin - Mauricie National Park area, Lac-aux-Sables area, Shawinigan area, Gouin Reservoir area, Parent area, Lake Bouchette area, La Tuque area
properties.Author: Environment Canada

properties.Title: Drinking Water Alert For The Village Of Buena Vista
properties.Summary:
Description: Village of Buena Vista has experienced a Watermain Break which has resulted in loss of Water for the entire Village of Buena Vista. Staff and Contractors are working on repairs.
Expires: 2019-08-22T14:00:00-06:00
Originated from CAP Alert: SK Regina Beach and Buena Vista, 2019-08-21T17:03:03-06:00, 9DFD872B-793D-628D-4E05-4AE7126954C4
Area: Village of Buena Vista
properties.Author: SK Regina Beach and Buena Vista
